bibl.note: More on "Aphelix". - P. Oxy. XXXI, 2611. - Poena quadrupli. - P. Oxy. I, 43 verso = W.Chr. 474: Back to Basics. - P. Oxy. XXII, 2338: What were the "Naukratito[n"?
